scripts.build:
echo '🚀 Starting build...' && time (bun run clean && echo '
📦 Building JS...' && bun run build:js && echo '
📝 Generating types...' && bun run build:types && echo '
✨ Build complete!
' && bun run check)
scripts.check:
echo '
📊 Build Stats:' && echo '===================' && echo '📁 Files:' && ls -lh dist | awk '{print $5, $9}' | grep -v '^total' && echo '
📦 Total Size:' && find dist -type f -exec ls -l {} \; | awk '{total += $5} END {printf "%.2f KB\n", total/1024}'
